sentences.en: "I can understand how you feel," Desmond said with great reasonableness.
sentences.cn: “我能理解你的感受，”德斯蒙德很通情达理地说。

sentences.en: (= I am very pleased ) to introduce tonight’s speaker.
sentences.cn: 我非常高兴请出今晚的演讲者。

sentences.en: A blizzard was blasting great drifts of snow across the lake.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪夹着大团的积雪吹过湖面。

sentences.en: a great day out for all the family
sentences.cn: 一家人愉快出游的一天

sentences.en: a non-departmental public body made up of the great and the good.
sentences.cn: 一个由显要人物组成的非部门性的群众团体。

sentences.en: all creatures great and small.
sentences.cn: 所有生物，无论大小。

sentences.en: all creatures great and small.
sentences.cn: 所有生物，无论大小。

sentences.en: all creatures great and small.
sentences.cn: 所有生物，无论大小。

sentences.en: Among the most spectacular sights are the great sea-bird colonies.
sentences.cn: 庞大的海鸟群是最壮观的景象之一。

sentences.en: Aromatic capsules are great for easing the discomfort of a stuffy nose.
sentences.cn: 芳香胶囊对缓解鼻塞有奇效。

sentences.en: Footballers in whopping great studded boots walk over the pitch.
sentences.cn: 脚蹬帅气钉靴的足球运动员走进了球场。

sentences.en: Great chess players have a reputation for being both eccentric and argumentative.
sentences.cn: 国际象棋大师们以性格怪异和好与人争辩而闻名。

sentences.en: He accused me of making a great fuss about trivialities.
sentences.cn: 他指责我为丁点琐事大惊小怪。

sentences.en: He showed great courage by admitting that he is an alcoholic.
sentences.cn: 他以极大的勇气承认自己酗酒。

sentences.en: Her literary criticism focuses on the way great literature suggests ideas.
sentences.cn: 她的文学批评集中关注的是伟大的文学作品表达思想的方式。

sentences.en: It gives me great pleasure (= I am very pleased ) to introduce tonight’s speaker.
sentences.cn: 我非常高兴请出今晚的演讲者。

sentences.en: It’s a great pity that none of his poems survive.
sentences.cn: 非常遗憾，他的诗歌没有一首保存下来。

sentences.en: It’s great to be home.
sentences.cn: 回家真好。

sentences.en: John always takes great care over his work.
sentences.cn: 约翰工作时总是非常小心。

sentences.en: my father was a great one for buying gadgets.
sentences.cn: 我父亲热衷于购买各种小玩意。

sentences.en: My great-grandfather was a person of some importance here.
sentences.cn: 我曾祖父曾是这儿的头面人物。

sentences.en: one of the greatest scientific achievements of our time
sentences.cn: 我们这个时代最伟大的科学成就之一

sentences.en: She's got a great voice and is singing better than ever.
sentences.cn: 她的嗓音非常好，现在的唱功比以往任何时候都要好。

sentences.en: The movie was a great success.
sentences.cn: 这部影片大获成功。

sentences.en: The news came as possibly the greatest shock of my life.
sentences.cn: 这个消息可能是我一生中最大的打击。

sentences.en: The paintings cost a great deal (= a lot ) of money.
sentences.cn: 这些画价值不菲。

sentences.en: The temptation was too great to resist.
sentences.cn: 诱惑太大，难以抵挡。

sentences.en: The weather here is great.
sentences.cn: 这里的天气非常好。

sentences.en: There's still an atmosphere of great hostility and tension in the city.
sentences.cn: 强烈的敌对和紧张气氛依然笼罩着这座城市。

sentences.en: Today's elections are of no great importance in themselves.
sentences.cn: 今天的选举本身并不是很重要。

sentences.en: we are all to a great extent the product of our culture.
sentences.cn: 我们所有人在很大程度上都是自己文化的产物。

sentences.en: What makes a novel truly great ?
sentences.cn: 是什么使一部小说真正伟大？

sentences.en: When the great man arrived, the club's manager personally escorted him upstairs.
sentences.cn: 那位要人到达时，俱乐部经理亲自陪他上楼。

sentences.en: Why should a great community like a university be afraid of nihilism?
sentences.cn: 为什么像大学这样人才济济的社区要害怕虚无主义呢？

phrases.tran_cn: 大量的；许多的；大部分的
大大小小的，无论大小的
大萧条（美国经济大萧条时期）
万里长城；中国长城计算机集团公司
有着重要意义，十分重要

trans.tran_cn: 伟大的，杰出的，优异的，显著的，很多的，重大的，极好的
trans.tran_en: very large in amount or degree

trans.tran_cn: [口语]很好地，令人满意地，成功地，顺利地，得意地
大人物们，伟大人物，重要人物，大师，名家
trans.tran_en: a very successful and famous person in a particular sport, profession etc
